audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Subtitles available! Subtítulos disponíveis!

scenes.visuals: The title "Subtitles available! Subtítulos disponíveis!" is shown with a row of flags representing the subtitles' languages.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: El interlingua una lengua panománica

scenes.visuals: A chart shows the Interlingua flag with arrows pointing outward to other Romance language flags. A thinking emoji is displayed next to the chart.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: NON

scenes.visuals: A red "X" is shown over the chart, and the word "NON" is displayed below the "X".

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: É possible que habias audito par lare de una lengua clamata interlingua

scenes.visuals: The video shows a man with shoulder-length brown hair speaking in front of a green screen.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Artículos, comentarios e vídeos en línea sobre questa incredibile lengua che connecta facilmente las lenguas románicas. Que plus se potete perdere?

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Bene, questo non é toto

scenes.visuals: The man continues speaking.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Plú specificamente, pare che ia una mala comprensione dello que realmente é lo interlingua

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Allora, que é veramente lo interlingua?

scenes.visuals: The screen reads "Que ést veramente lo interlingua?" against a yellow background.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo interlingua é una lengua auxliare internazionale desvelopata per la American International Auxiliary Language Association o IALA basada sobre las lenguas europeas populares atraverso de loro radiches grecas e latinas compartídas e en menore mesura orígenes indoeuropeos

scenes.visuals: The man continues speaking in front of the green screen.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: "The international vocabulary has absorbed materials of the most varied origins but its center of gravity lies in the sphere of the Greco-Latin tradition… …This group is the Anglo-Romance group of languages with German and Russian as potential contributors." -Interlingua-English: A Dictionary of the International Language

scenes.visuals: A picture of the book "Interlingua-English" appears on the left side of the screen, and text appears to the right of the image on a pinkish background. The text is a quote from the book and describes the influences on the language's vocabulary.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: "There are a good many instances of English words of Germanic origin which are related to words in the other control languages by Indo-European cognateship." -Interlingua-English: A Dictionary of the International Language

scenes.visuals: The image of the book remains on screen, but a new quote is shown on the right. This quote mentions the Indo-European origins of some English words.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Fu creato por essere una lengua planificata artificiale che se asse classe a las lenguas naturales, rendendola facilmente comprensibile a prima vista

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Questo é in contrasto con una lengua semelhante, lo esperanto, che fu creato por essere una lengua facile de apprender, mais allo costo de la intelligibilitate instantánea

scenes.visuals: The man continues speaking.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: De plus, lo que distingue lo interlingua dello esperanto fu una metodologia científica que determinao suo desvelopamento

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: La IALA usao quatro lenguas principales de controlo por determinare suo vocabulario e gramática

scenes.visuals: The screen shows "4 (Quattro) Lenguas de Contróllo" against a white background.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo francese, lo italiano, lo españiolo e lo portugese, tractatos como una sola unitate dovuto a loro similitudes, e finalmente lo inglese

scenes.visuals: Flags of France, Italy, Spain, Portugal, and the United Kingdom are displayed.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: En menore mesura, la IALA tambien consultao las lenguas secundarias de controlo, lo alemanno e lo russo

scenes.visuals: The words "2 (doas) Lenguas secundarias de controlo" appear on a dark gray background, followed by the flags of Germany and Russia.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Secondo suo principio de internationalitate, lo alemanno e lo russo se poterían sustituire por una lengua principale

scenes.visuals: The flags representing the primary languages and secondary languages of Interlingua are shown.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Allora, gia vedemos que varias lenguas non románicas han influenciado lo interlingua, perché lo interlingua fu conceputo por la comunicazione internazionale generale

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Nonostante, se entrare troppo in dettagli, la maggiore parte dello vocabulario, malgrado la influencia de lenguas non románicas como lo inglese, terminao provenendo dello latino clássico e de lenguas románicas

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Questa distintione é importante, perché las lenguas románicas son lenguas derivatas dello latino, soffrendo evoluctiones únicas tanto in loro vocabulario quanto loro gramática

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Las lenguas románicas frecuentemente han parolas clamatas doplettos, onde a veces una parola hereditao, e la otra parola con la mesma origine fu presa directamente dello latino clássico

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Por fachere un exemple, lo españiolo ha la parola heredidata delgado, e lo préstito latino delicado, cada uno con lo propio significato

scenes.visuals: The screen shows "Latino: delicātus." above "Delgado (Paraula heredatata)" and "Delicado (Présto)." The flags of Spain and the United Kingdom are below each phrase.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Nonostante, quando se trata della gramática dello interlingua, la historia é molto differente

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: La matología era tale che si estava absente una sola característica grammaticale, la excludero

scenes.visuals: The Interlingua flag is displayed with checkmarks below the flags of French, Italian, Spanish-Portuguese. An "x" is shown below the English flag.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Permetteme essere claro. La grammatica non fu determinata per las características della maggioría, mais piuttosto per lo denominatore commune de las características compartídas per totas las lenguas

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Como resultado, lo interlingua aripao ha de avere una grammatica europea media standard o, in otras parolas, una dramática que se asseblava a las características de base de las principales lenguas europeas

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: De facto, uno de los creadores dello interlingua, Alexander Gode, aveva descrito la grammatica dello interlingua así

scenes.visuals:
A book cover for "Manifesto de Interlingua" is displayed next to the following text:
"Le plus efficace maniera de formular iste conception ha essite, usque nunc, le tentativa de identificar interlingua con lo que le philologo american Benjamin Lee Wharf ha appellate le europeo medie standard (Standard Average European)." 
-Manifesto de Interlingua

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Soprattoto la gramática dello interlingua fu enormemente simplificata en comparacione con la gramática de las lenguas románicas a causa de la influencia dello inglese

scenes.visuals: The man continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Plus sopre questo plu tarde

scenes.visuals: The screen reads "Plus sopre questo plus tarde."

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Allora, ancora, comparemos lo interlingua con altro proiecto, lo romance neolatino o simplemente lo neolatino

scenes.visuals: The screen shows the neolatino flag and the words "Romance Neolatino (Neolatino)"

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo neolatino é una lengua panománica, una lengua creata specificamente por unire las lenguas románicas

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. A chart appears showing the neolatino flag with arrows pointing inward from the flags of other Romance languages.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Questo significa che a differenza de lenguas como lo interlingua, una lengua internazionale generale, lo neolatino facilita la communicazione entre parlantes de solo lenguas románicas, sene una influencia significativa per parte de lenguas non románicas, como lo inglese

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Como breve nota, si alguna veces has audito parlare dello intereslavo, una lengua por parlantes de lenguas eslavas

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. The screen shows the intereslavo flag and the words "Intereslavo" and "Medžuslovjansky."

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo neolatino é lo mesmo, mais por parlantes de lenguas románicas

scenes.visuals: The intereslavo flag is shown above a row of Slavic language flags with the text "Por lenguas eslavas." Below that, the neolatino flag is shown above a row of Romance language flags with the text "Por lenguas románicas."

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: De facto, Jan van Steenbergen, uno de los creadores dello intereslavo, incluso assistéo allo congresso en 2022

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. The screen shows a YouTube video called "International Congress of Romance Neolatino (IRIN) 2022 - COMPLETE EVENT."

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Allora, lo obbiettivo dello interlingua é plu generale, mentre che lo neolatino fu creato solo por parlantes de lenguas románicas

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Como resultado dello obbiettivo único de lo neolatino, lo neolatino é molto plu semelhante a las lenguas románicas modernas, mantenendo suo charactere románico

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Ahora que habemos determinado lo obbiettivo de cada proiecto, comparemos lo vocabulario

scenes.visuals: The screen shows "LO VOCABULARIO" with an open book icon below.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: En la majore parte de los casos, tanto lo interlingua quanto lo neolatino han parolas semejantes

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: En primo loco, lo interlingua include muitas parolas dello latino clássico que non se usan de loto en las lenguas románicas, como igitur e sed

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. The screen shows "igitur" on the left and "sed" on the right. Under "igitur," the Portuguese, Spanish, French, and Italian words for "then" and "therefore" are listed. Under "sed," the Romance words for "but" are listed.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: En secondo loco, lo interlingua ha otras parolas dello latino clássico, mais se usan de manera diferente en comparacione con las lenguas románicas, como extra e ex

scenes.visuals: The screen shows "Extra" on the left and "Ex" on the right. Under each word, some examples are listed from Portuguese, Spanish, French, Italian, Romanian, and English.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: En terzo loco, lo interlingua ha parolas que por una razione o otra son diferentes de las formas que se encontran en las lenguas románicas

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Algunos cognatos adoptan lo aspecto dello latino clássico, como Inter en vece de Entre

scenes.visuals: The screen shows "Inter" and below it, the Portuguese, Spanish, French, Italian, Romanian, and English words for "between" and "among."

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: De plus, algunas parolas non se asse blan a las formas presentes en las lenguas románicas intencionalmente

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues speaking. A table on the screen shows different words for "time" and "heart" in Portuguese, Spanish, French, and English.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: es dicere, parolas como tempore in vece de tempo, e corde in vece de cuore

scenes.visuals: The words "Tempo" and "Corazón" appear on screen, crossed out with red Xs, and replaced below with the words "Tempore" and "Corde."

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Questo é dovuto allo facto que los desvelopatores dello interlingua voleva mantenere una clara relatione morfológica entre los sustantivos e los adjetivos correspondentes, como temporal e cordial

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. The words "Tempore" and "Corde" appear on screen, with red arrows pointing downward from them to the words "Temporal" and "Cordial."

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: En algunas parolas descartan las evoluctiones románicas

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. The words "Latino: ovis" are shown on the left, and "Latino: ovis + cula = ovicula" are shown on the right. Both Latin words are connected with arrows to the respective Interlingua and Neolatino words for "sheep." Different words for sheep are listed below in Portuguese, Spanish, Catalan, French, Romanian, and English.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Un caso semejante con aure in vece de orecla o orelia

scenes.visuals: The words "Latino: auris" are shown on the left, and "Latino: auris + cula = auricula" are shown on the right. Both Latin words are connected with arrows to the respective Interlingua and Neolatino words for "ear." Different words for ear are listed below in Portuguese, Spanish, Catalan, French, Romanian, and English.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Ditto questo, lo interlingua sí contiene cognatos tambien con un aspecto románico

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. A document is visible behind them.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Principalmente gracies allo travalio dello dottore Stanley Mulaik

scenes.visuals: Another document is visible behind the speaker.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Plus sopre questo plu tarde

scenes.visuals: The text on screen reads "Plus sopre questo plus tarde… x2"

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: La grammática dello interlingua é molto differente de quella de las lenguas románicas

scenes.visuals: The words "La grammática?" appear on screen above the Interlingua flag and a series of Romance language flags.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Uno. Lo génére

scenes.visuals: The words "8 (ócto) Módos fundamentales" appear on a yellow background.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Allo interlingua le manca lo genere grammaticale dovuto alla influenza dello inglese

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. The screen shows "1. Lo génére." On the left, under the Interlingua flag, text in Interlingua is presented with an English translation below under the flag of the United Kingdom.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Dos. La concordancia grammaticale

scenes.visuals: The words "2. La concordancia grammaticale" appear against a yellow background.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo neolatino ancora ha la concordance grammaticale

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. Phrases in Interlingua and Neolatino are presented with a translation in English below. The Neolatino words that agree in number are highlighted.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Tres. Conjugationes verbales

scenes.visuals: The words "3. Conjugationes verbales" appear on a yellow background.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo neolatino ancora ha conjugationes verbales únicas

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. Some conjugated verbs in Interlingua and Neolatino are shown with an English translation below. The conjugation of the Neolatino verbs are highlighted.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Questo nos porta logicamente a la seguente differenza

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Quattro. La eliminatione de pronomes personales

scenes.visuals: The words "4. La eliminatione de pronomes personales" appear against a yellow background.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: En interlingua é obligatorio lo pronome personale ante la forma conjugata dello verbo

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. Two examples of phrases in Interlingua are shown with an English translation below.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: En neolatino, como en la majoría de las lenguas románicas, se pote excludere lo pronome, perché lo verbo conjugato ja communica lo soggetto

scenes.visuals: Examples of phrases in Interlingua and Neolatino are shown, again with English translation. The Neolatino example is modified to omit the pronoun, and the example with the pronoun is presented with a checkmark.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Cinco. La expressione dello passato

scenes.visuals: The words "5. La expressione dello passato" appear against a yellow background.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: En interlingua, en oppositione a lo neolatino, existe un solo tempo verbale simple que parla sobre lo passato

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. The screen shows "5. Lo passato" on a beige background. Conjugations of verbs from Interlingua and Neolatino are presented with English translation below.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo neolatino mantiene lo presente continuo

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues speaking. The screen shows "6. Lo presénte contínuo."

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Septe. Lo módo subjunctivo

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues speaking. The words "7. Lo módo subjunctivo" appear on a yellow background.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo módo subjunctivo, lo módo della irrealtate está presente en neolatino, mais en interlingua non

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues speaking. Examples of Interlingua and Neolatino phrases using the subjunctive are presented, with an English translation below. The subjunctive verb is highlighted in the Neolatino example.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo interlingua ha dos pronomes impersonales

scenes.visuals: The words "8. Pronomess impersonales" appear against a yellow background.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Malgrado questa apparenti differencias entre lo interlingua e lo neolatino, la confusione persiste

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues speaking. The words "LA CONFUSIONE" appear above a confused-looking emoji. This is followed by the words "Las paraullas paren románicas…" above a thinking emoji.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: La ratione plu obvia por questo e que simplemente las personas non conocen lo neolatino

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. The screen shows text and images of social media posts and comments demonstrating that people often believe Interlingua is a Romance language.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Oké, allora perché é malo questo?

scenes.visuals: The words "Per que ést questo malo?" appear above a thinking emoji.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: La diffusione deffectuosa de informatione sopre lo interlingua presenta una crise de identitate confusa con varias consequenzias

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues speaking in front of the green screen. This is followed by text from a forum post about Interlingua and the Romance languages.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: É possibile que la gente aprenda interlingua por la razione errata, dunque algunas personas se poterian sentire traditas, sentendose come si avessen perduto loro tempo

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Questas personas poate denegrale lo interlingua e dicere que manca una ánima, perché han una preconceptione errata della lengua. Las personas conscientemente provan de cambiare lo interlingua ad una lengua románica, perché vede la forma basica della lengua como deffectuosa

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Oltre a questo, lo proiecto interlingua románica naseo dello deseo de dare allo interlingua una gramática tradizionalmente románica

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. A web page is visible behind them.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Ia dois escolas de pensamento entre los usuarios dello interlingua. Un gruppo crede que la lengua debería essere plu romántica, e lo altro gruppo crede che rendere lo interlingua plu romántico va contra lo spirito della lengua

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues speaking. A screen shows two boxes labeled "Gruppo 1" and "Gruppo 2." A happy emoji is shown in the first box, along with the text "Plus románico = Bóno." A shrugging emoji is in the second box with the words "Plus románico = Malo."

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo problema de questas propostas é que oltre allo facto que non son universalmente accettatas, se basan sopre una falsa impressione della lengua

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: En contrasto, la bellezza dello neolatino é che é fondamentalmente románico

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. A thinking emoji appears next to an image of some grass, followed by an image of some scissors.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Non son necesarias las propostas de reforma perché lo neolatino non tenta essere plu che una feramenta por unire las lenguas románicas

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: De plus, lo neolatino ha una ánima. A mi ánima

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. On screen, two charts are displayed comparing sentence structures of Interlingua and Neolatino. The words "Ánima" and "No ánima" are shown above the Neolatino and Interlingua charts.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: De facto, algunos de questo recursos ha usato ante de apprendere neolatino

scenes.visuals: The words "AD QUI IMPORTA?" appear above a skeptical emoji.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: De plus, un dictionario en línea, un dictionario PDF, un conjugatore, un documento di grammatica

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. Some pages of dictionaries and workbooks are shown on screen.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: E questo sene mencionar otros materiales en curso como listas de vocabulario e lecciones

scenes.visuals: An image of a spreadsheet is shown with columns labeled "Neolatino," "Italiano," "Portughese," "Spagnolo," "Catalano," "Francese," and "Romano."

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: La comunitate neolatina cresce cata dia, e nos placería molto averete

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. A Facebook group for Neolatino appears on screen, as well as an online dictionary.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Forse estés pensando, "oké, incluso si lo interlingua non é panománico, quale é lo problema?" O sea, non lo potes usare simplemente como una lengua panománica egualmente?

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues speaking. The words "AD QUI IMPORTA?" appear with an indifferent emoji.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Bene, lo explicherai así. Lo fatto che qualcosa possa tecnicamente compire un fine, non vuole dicere che sia la solutione ideale. Per esempio, preferíes tagliare la herba con lo uso de forfe ches, o una tallia herba?

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. An indifferent emoji is shown along with an image of an overgrown field. Scissors then appear over the image. The scissors are crossed out by a large red "X" and replaced by a lawnmower. A happy emoji appears.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Oltre allo facto que clamare lo interlingua románico é incorrecto por las razones que já ha numerato, diría que é una injusticia a la hereditate de las lenguas románicas, non devotarse plenamente a lo que las rende únicas. Puedes communicare lo significato, mais puotes communicare la historia

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak. The words "NUNCA FU ROMÁNICO" appear on the screen.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Lo interlingua e lo neolatino son simplemente dos proyectos distinctos con obbiettivos differentes

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues speaking.  The screen shows the Interlingua and Neolatino flags along with some information about each language.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Non é necessario apprendere neolatino

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: De plus, lo neolatino ha una ánima. A mi ánima, a la ánima de los otros usuarios. E soprattoto a la ánima de las lenguas románicas

scenes.visuals: The presenter continues to speak.

audio.speaker: Narrator
audio.transcription: Visita nos en neolatino.eu.

scenes.visuals: Social media information for Neolatino is shown on the screen.
